Job Description: Minimum Qualification :   Bachelors Degree     Key Skills-    - Setting up, maintaining, and performing test automation frameworks on application platforms   - Should know Karate for the API testing or its equivalent   - Should know Cypress for the Angular or its equivalent   - The candidate should be familiar with Java/Angular to understand the component relations.   - Should have experience in working with the Agile/Scrum team model.   - Self-driven with excellent communication skills   - Bachelor s degree is required from an accredited institution.
